mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users(userId, password, email, gender, birthday, originCountry, livingCountry, livingTown, aboutMe) VALUES(#{userId}, #{password}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{originCountry}, #{livingCountry}, #{livingTown}, #{aboutMe})
mapper.select: SELECT EXISTS (SELECT userId FROM users WHERE userId = #{userId})
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM users WHERE userId = #{userId} AND password = #{password})
